muted.description: Muted or very soft panel background

inverse.description: Inverted background (dark card in light UI or vice versa)

opacity-40.description: Default overlay opacity for light mode

opacity-60.description: Stronger overlay opacity for dark mode

opacity-heavy.description: Heavier overlay for destructive modals or blocking UI

opacity-light.description: Subtle surface blur layer, e.g. popovers

opacity-0.description: Default overlay opacity for light mode

color-inverse.description: Main text on dark surface (e.g., dark navbar)

color-muted.description: For less prominent text (useful for read-only)

color-primary.description: Default icon on light background (UI, nav, content icons)

color-inverse.description: Icons on dark surfaces (modals, buttons, navbar)

color-secondary.description: Subtle helper icons (e.g., in inputs, placeholders)

color-pressed.description: Icon color when pressed (tapped or clicked state)

color-error.description: Icon for errors or failed states

error.description: Input border or card outline in error
